19 int myRandomUniform(int n) {
20  int top = ((((RAND_MAX - n) + 1) / n) * n - 1) + n;
21  int r;
22  do {
23  r = rand();
24  } while (r > top);
25  return (r % n);
26 }

32 std::mt19937 rng(time(NULL));

41 int random(int n) {
42  std::uniform_int_distribution<int> distribution(0, n);
43  return distribution(rng);
44 }

54 template<typename T>
55 int random(T min, T max) {
56  std::uniform_real_distribution<T> distribution(min, max);
57  return distribution(rng);
58 }

71 void random_query(std::vector<float>& q, int n) {
72  for(size_t i = 0; i < q.size(); ++i) {
73  q[i] = random(n);
74  if(myRandomUniform(2))
75  q[i] *= -1;
76  }
77 }
